summary: Desmond "Des" Henry Browne, Baron Browne of Ladyton  is a Scottish politician and was Secretary of State for Defence and Secretary of State for Scotland.
full_text:
Desmond Henry Browne, Baron Browne of Ladyton  is a British Labour Party politician who was the Member of Parliament  for Kilmarnock and Loudoun from 1997 to 2010. He was a member of the Cabinet of the United Kingdom under Tony Blair and Gordon Brown, until the latter moved him from both Defence and Scottish Secretary in 2008.
